amendment.description: Amendment allocates $1.5 million to complement a continuing medication course in pain mangagement for veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce then increase funding for Departmental Administration, General Administration, by $1.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Keating.
